name: CUSTOM Header #14
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign border_bottom = section.settings.border_bottom
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign show_type = section.settings.show_type
  assign transparent_bg = section.settings.transparent_bg

  assign sidebar_menu = section.settings.sidebar_menu
  assign sidebar_menu_divider_color = section.settings.sidebar_menu_divider_color
  assign sidebar_menu_divider_thickness = section.settings.sidebar_menu_divider_thickness

  assign burger_text = section.settings.burger_text
  assign burger_close_text = section.settings.burger_close_text
  assign burger_text_size = section.settings.burger_text_size
  assign burger_text_size_mobile = section.settings.burger_text_size_mobile
  assign burger_text_color = section.settings.burger_text_color
  assign burger_text_hero_color = section.settings.burger_text_hero_color
  assign burger_text_hover_hero_color = section.settings.burger_text_hover_hero_color
  assign burger_text_hover_color = section.settings.burger_text_hover_color 
  assign burger_text_custom = section.settings.burger_text_custom
  assign burger_text_font = section.settings.burger_text_font
  assign burger_text_height = section.settings.burger_text_height

  assign list_gap_mobile = section.settings.list_gap_mobile
  assign list_gap = section.settings.list_gap

  assign link_size = section.settings.link_size
  assign link_size_mobile = section.settings.link_size_mobile
  assign link_color = section.settings.link_color
  assign link_hover_color = section.settings.link_hover_color 
  assign link_custom = section.settings.link_custom
  assign link_font = section.settings.link_font
  assign link_height = section.settings.link_height

  assign burger_icon = section.settings.burger_icon
  assign burger_icon_mobile = section.settings.burger_icon_mobile
  assign menu_icon_size = section.settings.menu_icon_size
  assign menu_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.menu_icon_size_mobile

  assign sidebar_width = section.settings.sidebar_width 
  
  assign logo = section.settings.logo
  assign second_logo = section.settings.second_logo
  assign logo_mobile = section.settings.logo_mobile
  assign second_logo_mobile = section.settings.second_logo_mobile
  assign logo_width = section.settings.logo_width
  assign logo_width_mobile = section.settings.logo_width_mobile
  
  assign name_size = section.settings.name_size
  assign name_size_mobile = section.settings.name_size_mobile
  assign name_color = section.settings.name_color
  assign name_hero_color = section.settings.name_hero_color
  assign name_hover_hero_color = section.settings.name_hover_hero_color
  assign name_hover_color = section.settings.name_hover_color
  assign name_custom = section.settings.name_custom
  assign name_font = section.settings.name_font
  assign name_height = section.settings.name_height

  assign right_gap_mobile = section.settings.right_gap_mobile
  assign right_gap = section.settings.right_gap

  assign right_link_size = section.settings.right_link_size
  assign right_link_color = section.settings.right_link_color
  assign right_link_hover_color = section.settings.right_link_hover_color
  assign right_link_hover_hero_color = section.settings.right_link_hover_hero_color
  assign right_link_custom = section.settings.right_link_custom
  assign right_link_hero_color = section.settings.right_link_hero_color
  assign right_link_font = section.settings.right_link_font
  assign right_link_height = section.settings.right_link_height

  assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile
  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size  

  assign use_search = section.settings.use_search
  assign search_text  = section.settings.search_text
  assign search_icon_desktop  = section.settings.search_icon_desktop
  assign search_menu_mobile = section.settings.search_menu_mobile

  assign use_account = section.settings.use_account
  assign account_text  = section.settings.account_text
  assign account_icon_desktop  = section.settings.account_icon_desktop
  assign account_menu_mobile = section.settings.account_menu_mobile

  assign cart_text  = section.settings.cart_text
  assign cart_icon_desktop  = section.settings.cart_icon_desktop
  
  assign sidebar_bg_color = section.settings.sidebar_bg_color
  assign sidebar_padding_horizontal = section.settings.sidebar_padding_horizontal
  assign sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign sidebar_padding_vertical = section.settings.sidebar_padding_vertical
  assign sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile

  assign slider_heading = section.settings.slider_heading
  assign sidebar_menu_bottom_heading = section.settings.sidebar_menu_bottom_heading
  assign slider_heading_size = section.settings.slider_heading_size
  assign slider_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.slider_heading_size_mobile
  assign slider_heading_color = section.settings.slider_heading_color
  assign slider_heading_custom = section.settings.slider_heading_custom
  assign slider_heading_font = section.settings.slider_heading_font
  assign slider_heading_height = section.settings.slider_heading_height

  assign first_promotional_image = section.settings.first_promotional_image
  assign second_promotional_image = section.settings.second_promotional_image
  assign third_promotional_image = section.settings.third_promotional_image
  assign fourth_promotional_image = section.settings.fourth_promotional_image
  assign promotional_image_radius = section.settings.promotional_image_radius
  assign promotional_image_border_thickness = section.settings.promotional_image_border_thickness
  assign promotional_image_border_color = section.settings.promotional_image_border_color
  assign promotional_image_ratio = section.settings.promotional_image_ratio
  assign promotional_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.promotional_image_ratio_mobile

  assign first_promotional_title = section.settings.first_promotional_title
  assign second_promotional_title = section.settings.second_promotional_title
  assign third_promotional_title = section.settings.third_promotional_title
  assign fourth_promotional_title = section.settings.fourth_promotional_title
  assign promotional_title_size = section.settings.promotional_title_size
  assign promotional_title_size_mobile = section.settings.promotional_title_size_mobile
  assign promotional_title_color = section.settings.promotional_title_color
  assign promotional_title_custom = section.settings.promotional_title_custom
  assign promotional_title_font = section.settings.promotional_title_font
  assign promotional_title_height = section.settings.promotional_title_height

  assign first_url = section.settings.first_url
  assign second_url = section.settings.second_url
  assign third_url = section.settings.third_url
  assign fourth_url = section.settings.fourth_url

  assign bottom_sidebar_menu = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_menu
  
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_size = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_size
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_size_mobile = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_size_mobile
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_color = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_color
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_hover_color = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_hover_color
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_custom = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_custom
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_font = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_font
  assign bottom_sidebar_link_height = section.settings.bottom_sidebar_link_height

  assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  if lazy 
    assign loading_attribute = 'lazy' 
  endif 
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ name_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ burger_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ right_link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ bottom_sidebar_link_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ promotional_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ slider_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;  
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    position: relative;
    border: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  
  {% if transparent_bg == "all" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}.transparent {
      background-color: transparent !important;
      background-image: none !important;
      position: absolute;
      width: calc(100% - {{margin_horizontal_mobile | times: 2 }}rem);
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      z-index: 999;
    }
  {% elsif transparent_bg == "home"  %}
    {% if template.name == "index" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}.transparent {
      background-color: transparent !important;
      background-image: none !important;
      position: absolute;
      width: calc(100% - {{margin_horizontal_mobile | times: 2 }}rem);
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      z-index: 999;
    }
    {% endif %}
  {% endif %}

  .header-{{ section.id }}.onscroll {
    background-color:{{ background_color }} !important;
    background-image: {{ background_gradient }} !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.fixed {
    position: fixed !important;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: calc(100% - {{margin_horizontal_mobile | times: 2 }}rem);
    z-index: 999;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.scroll {
    transform: translateY(-150%);
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.scroll.active {
    transform: translateY(0);
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    align-items: center;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr {{ logo_width_mobile }}px 1fr;
  }

  .header-logo-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: center;
  }
      
  .header-menu-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ list_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .header-menu-list-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 0px;
    display: none;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ list_gap_mobile }}px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    list-style: none;
  }

  .header-sidebar-menu-{{ section.id }} .header-menu-list-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: start;
  }

  .header-menu-item-{{ section.id }} {
    line-height: 100%;
    cursor: pointer;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding-bottom: 3px;
  }

  .header-menu-link-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ link_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ link_color }};
    line-height: {{ link_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 3;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open.transparent .header-menu-link-{{ section.id }} {
    color: {{ link_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-menu-item-main-{{ section.id }} > .header-menu-link-{{ section.id }}:after,
  .header-menu-mobile-toggle-{{ section.id }}:after{
    content: '';
    display: block;
    background-color: {{ link_hover_color }};
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -2px;
    height: 1.5px;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    width: 0;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-menu-item-parent-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    max-width: fit-content;
    flex-basis: 0;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: 0;
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 3;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    box-shadow: none;
    min-width: 20px;
    min-height: 20px;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-icon-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-icon-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .header-sidebar-close-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: fit-content;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .header-sidebar-close-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: {{ menu_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ menu_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  {% if transparent_bg == "all" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }} p {
      color: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
    }

    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
    }

    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
      background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
    }
  {% elsif transparent_bg == "home"  %}
    {% if template.name == "index" %}
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }} p {
        color: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
      }

      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
      }

      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
        background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
      }
    {% endif %}
  {% endif %}

  
  {% if transparent_bg == "all" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover p {
      color: {{ burger_text_hover_hero_color }};
    }

    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      background: {{ burger_text_hover_hero_color }};
    }

    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
      background: {{ burger_text_hover_hero_color }};
    }
  {% elsif transparent_bg == "home"  %}
    {% if template.name == "index" %}
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover p {
        color: {{ burger_text_hover_hero_color }};
      }

      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        background: {{ burger_text_hover_hero_color }};
      }

      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
        background: {{ burger_text_hover_hero_color }};
      }
    {% endif %}
  {% endif %}

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ burger_text_color }};
  }

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }} p {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ burger_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ burger_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ burger_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: relative;
    font-weight: 700;
    z-index: 3;
    font-family: 'Montserrat';
  }

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    background: {{ burger_text_hover_color }};
    transition: color 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
    background: {{ burger_text_hover_color }};
    transition: color 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }} span {
    width: {{ menu_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}:hover p {
    color: {{ burger_text_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  
  .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 0;
    margin-top: -1px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1.5px;
    background: {{ burger_text_color }};
    transition: transform .4s ease; 
  }

  {% if transparent_bg == "all" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
    }

    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
      background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
    }
  {% elsif transparent_bg == "home"  %}
    {% if template.name == "index" %}
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
        background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
      }

      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
        background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
      }
    {% endif %}
  {% endif %}

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: rotate(45deg);
    transition-delay: .22s;
    background: {{ burger_text_color }} !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after,
  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before {
     background: {{ burger_text_color }} !important;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
  .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1.5px;
    background-color: inherit;
    background: {{ burger_text_color }};
    transition: color 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before {
    top: -6px;
    transition: top .25s ease .27s, opacity .25s ease, width .25s ease;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before {
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    transition: top .2s ease, opacity .2s ease .22s, width .1s ease;
    background: {{ burger_text_color }} !important;
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after {
    bottom: -6px;
    transition: bottom .25s ease .27s, transform .25s ease, width .25s ease;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after {
    bottom: 0;
    transform: rotate(-90deg);
    width: 100%;
    transition: bottom .2s ease, transform .2s ease .22s, width .1s ease;
    background: {{ burger_text_color }} !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background: {{ burger_text_hover_color }} !important;
  }

   .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}:hover::after,
   .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}:hover::before {
     background: {{ burger_text_hover_color }} !important;
   }

  {% if transparent_bg == "all" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
      background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
    }
  {% elsif transparent_bg == "home"  %}
    {% if template.name == "index" %}
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::before,
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }}::after{
        background: {{ burger_text_hero_color }};
      }
    {% endif %}
  {% endif %}

  .header-logo-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 3;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-logo-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-logo-image-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: {{ logo_width_mobile }}px;
  }

  .header-logo-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .header-logo-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .header-logo-image-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .header-logo-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ name_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ name_color }};
    line-height: {{ name_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    font-weight: 700;
  }
  
  {% if transparent_bg == "all" %}
    .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-logo-text-{{ section.id }} {
      color: {{ name_hero_color }};
    }
  {% elsif transparent_bg == "home"  %}
    {% if template.name == "index" %}
      .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-logo-text-{{ section.id }} {
        color: {{ name_hero_color }};
      }
    {% endif %}
  {% endif %}

  .header-block-logo-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 3;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  
  .header-{{ section.id }} .header-logo-first-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }} .header-logo-second-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-logo-first-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open.transparent .header-logo-first-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}:not(.onscroll).transparent .header-logo-second-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open.transparent .header-logo-second-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-{{ section.id }}.open .header-block-logo-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .header-block-logo-image-{{ section.id }} {

    }

    .header-cart-{{ section.id }} .cart-count-bubble {
      position: static;
      transform: translateX(0);
    }

    .header-cart-{{ section.id }}:hover .cart-count-bubble span {
      transition: all .25s ease 0s;
      color: {{ right_link_hover_color }};
    }
    
    .header-search-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block !important;
    }

    .header-search-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .header-menu-mobile-submenu-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ link_size | plus: 4 }}px;
    }

    .header-menu-sidebar-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ sidebar_width }}%;     
    }

    .header-menu-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ list_gap }}px;
    }

    .header-menu-list-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ list_gap }}px;
    }

    .header-logo-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }

    .header-logo-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .header-block-logo-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }

    .header-block-logo-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }} * {    
      font-size: {{ promotional_title_size }}px;
    }

    .header-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ slider_heading_size }}px;  
    }
  }

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} header-{{ section.id }} {% if transparent_bg != 'none' %}transparent{% endif %} {% if show_type == "always" %}fixed{% elsif show_type == "scroll_up" %}scroll active fixed{% else %}top{% endif %}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="header-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="header-menu-{{ section.id }}">   
          <button class="header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}">
            <p>{{ burger_text }}</p>
            {% if burger_icon != blank %}
              <span class="header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} header-menu-burger-icon-desktop-{{ section.id }}"></span>
            {% endif %}
            {% if burger_icon_mobile != blank %}
              <span class="header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} header-menu-burger-icon-mobile-{{ section.id }}"></span>
            {% endif %}   
          </button>

          <div class="header-menu-sidebar-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="header-menu-sidebar-inner-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="header-menu-sidebar-inner-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                <div class="header-menu-sidebar-top-{{ section.id }}">               
                  <button class="header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}">      
                    <p>{{ burger_close_text }}</p>            
                    {% if burger_icon != blank %}
                      <span class="header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} header-menu-burger-icon-desktop-{{ section.id }}"></span>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if burger_icon_mobile != blank %}
                      <span class="header-menu-burger-icon-{{ section.id }} header-menu-burger-icon-mobile-{{ section.id }}"></span>
                    {% endif %}         
                  </button>         
                  <ul class="header-menu-list-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% for block in section.blocks %}
                      {% if block.type == 'menu_item' %}                  
                        <li class="header-menu-item-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.link_menu and block.settings.url == blank %}header-mobile-menu-item-parent-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">
                          {% if block.settings.url != blank %}
                            <a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" class="header-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</a>
                          {% else %}
                            <div class="header-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">
                              {{ block.settings.title }}
                                <span class="header-menu-item-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                                  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 16 16" role="presentation"><path fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" d="M2.183 5.183a.625.625 0 0 1 .884 0l4.827 4.828a.208.208 0 0 0 .295 0l4.827-4.828a.625.625 0 0 1 .884.884l-4.827 4.827c-.57.57-1.493.57-2.063 0L2.183 6.067a.625.625 0 0 1 0-.884Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                                </span>
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                          {% if block.settings.link_menu and block.settings.url == blank %}
                            <div class="header-menu-mobile-submenu-{{ section.id }}">
                              <div class="header-menu-mobile-submenu-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                                <button class="header-menu-mobile-submenu-heading-{{ section.id }}">
                                  <span class="header-menu-item-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 16 16" role="presentation"><path fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" d="M2.183 5.183a.625.625 0 0 1 .884 0l4.827 4.828a.208.208 0 0 0 .295 0l4.827-4.828a.625.625 0 0 1 .884.884l-4.827 4.827c-.57.57-1.493.57-2.063 0L2.183 6.067a.625.625 0 0 1 0-.884Z" clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>
                                  </span>
                                  {{ block.settings.title }}
                                </button>                            
                                <ul class="header-mobile-submenu-list-{{ section.id }}">
                                  {% for link in block.settings.link_menu.links %}
                                    <li class="header-menu-item-{{ section.id }}">
                                      <a href="{{ link.url }}" class="header-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ link.title }}</a>                                  
                                    </li>
                                  {% endfor %}
                                </ul>
                                {% if block.settings.shop_by_heading != blank %}
                                  <div class="header-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.shop_by_heading }}</div>
                                {% endif %}
                                {% if block.settings.shop_by_menu != blank %}
                                  <div class="header-sidebar-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
                                    <ul class="header-sidebar-bottom-list-{{ section.id }}">
                                      {% for link in block.settings.shop_by_menu.links %}
                                        <li>
                                          <a href="{{ link.url }}" class="header-bottom-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ link.title }}</a>
                                        </li>
                                      {% endfor %}
                                    </ul>
                                  </div>   
                                {% endif %}  
                                <div class="header-sidebar-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                                  {% if slider_heading != blank %}
                                    <div class="header-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ slider_heading }}</div>
                                  {% endif %}
                                  <div class="header-sidebar-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper"
                                    data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
                                    data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}">
                                    <div class="swiper-wrapper">                    
                                      {% if block.settings.first_promotional_image != blank or block.settings.first_promotional_title != blank %}
                                        <{% if block.settings.first_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.first_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                                            {% if block.settings.first_promotional_image != blank %}               
                                              {{ block.settings.first_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                                alt: block.settings.first_promotional_image.alt | escape
                                              }}
                                            {% else %}
                                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                                            {% endif %}  
                                          </div>
                                          {% if block.settings.first_promotional_title != blank %}
                                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_promotional_title }}</div>
                                          {% endif %}
                                        </{% if block.settings.first_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}> 
                                      {% endif %}   
                                      {% if block.settings.second_promotional_image != blank or block.settings.second_promotional_title != blank %}
                                        <{% if block.settings.second_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.second_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                                            {% if block.settings.second_promotional_image != blank %}               
                                              {{ block.settings.second_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                                alt: block.settings.second_promotional_image.alt | escape
                                              }}
                                            {% else %}
                                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                                            {% endif %}  
                                          </div>
                                          {% if block.settings.second_promotional_title != blank %}
                                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_promotional_title }}</div>
                                          {% endif %}
                                        </{% if block.settings.second_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>   
                                      {% endif %}
                                      {% if block.settings.third_promotional_image != blank or block.settings.third_promotional_title != blank %}
                                        <{% if block.settings.third_url != blank %}a href="{{  block.settings.third_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                                            {% if block.settings.third_promotional_image != blank %}               
                                              {{ block.settings.third_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                                alt: block.settings.third_promotional_image.alt | escape
                                              }}
                                            {% else %}
                                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                                            {% endif %}  
                                          </div>
                                          {% if block.settings.third_promotional_title != blank %}
                                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_promotional_title }}</div>
                                          {% endif %}
                                        </{% if block.settings.third_url != blank %}a"{% else %}div{% endif %}>   
                                      {% endif %}
                                      {% if block.settings.fourth_promotional_image != blank or block.settings.fourth_promotional_title != blank %}
                                        <{% if block.settings.fourth_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.fourth_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                                            {% if block.settings.fourth_promotional_image != blank %}               
                                              {{ block.settings.fourth_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                                alt: block.settings.fourth_promotional_image.alt | escape
                                              }}
                                            {% else %}
                                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                                            {% endif %}  
                                          </div>
                                          {% if block.settings.fourth_promotional_title != blank %}
                                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.fourth_promotional_title }}</div>
                                          {% endif %}
                                        </{% if block.settings.fourth_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>          
                                      {% endif %}       
                                    </div>                  
                                  </div>
                                </div> 
                                         
                                {% if block.settings.sidebar_menu_bottom_heading != blank %}
                                  <div class="header-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.sidebar_menu_bottom_heading }}</div>
                                {% endif %}
                        
                                {% if block.settings.bottom_sidebar_menu != blank %}
                                  <div class="header-sidebar-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
                                    <ul class="header-sidebar-bottom-list-{{ section.id }}">
                                      {% for link in block.settings.bottom_sidebar_menu.links %}
                                        <li>
                                          <a href="{{ link.url }}" class="header-bottom-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ link.title }}</a>
                                        </li>
                                      {% endfor %}
                                    </ul>
                                  </div>   
                                {% endif %}  
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          {% endif %}
                        </li>
                      {% endif %}              
                    {% endfor %}     
                    {% if use_search and search_menu_mobile %}
                      <li class="header-menu-item-{{ section.id }} header-menu-item-search-{{ section.id }}">
                        <a href="{{ routes.search_url }}" class="header-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ search_text }}</a>
                      </li>
                   {% endif %}
                   {% if use_account and account_menu_mobile %}
                      <li class="header-menu-item-{{ section.id }} header-menu-item-account-{{ section.id }}">
                        <a href="{{ routes.account_url }}" class="header-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ account_text }}</a>
                      </li>
                   {% endif %}             
                  </ul>                   
                </div>            
           
                <div class="header-sidebar-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">

                    data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
                    data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}">
                    <div class="swiper-wrapper">                
                      {% if first_promotional_image != blank or first_promotional_title != blank %}    
                        <{% if first_url != blank %}a href="{{ first_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if first_promotional_image != blank %}               
                              {{ first_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                alt: first_promotional_image.alt | escape
                              }}
                            {% else %}
                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                            {% endif %}  
                          </div>
                          {% if first_promotional_title != blank %}
                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ first_promotional_title }}</div>
                          {% endif %}
                        </{% if first_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>  
                      {% endif %}

                        <{% if second_url != blank %}a href="{{ second_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if second_promotional_image != blank %}               
                              {{ second_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                loading: loading_attribute,

                          {% if second_promotional_title != blank %}
                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ second_promotional_title }}</div>
                          {% endif %}
                        </{% if second_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>   
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if third_promotional_image != blank or third_promotional_title != blank %}  
                        <{% if third_url != blank %}a href="{{ third_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if third_promotional_image != blank %}               
                              {{ third_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                alt: third_promotional_image.alt | escape
                              }}
                            {% else %}
                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                            {% endif %}  
                          </div>
                          {% if third_promotional_title != blank %}
                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ third_promotional_title }}</div>
                          {% endif %}
                        </{% if third_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>   
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if fourth_promotional_image != blank or fourth_promotional_title != blank %}  
                        <{% if fourth_url != blank %}a href="{{ fourth_url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="header-sidebar-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                          <div class="header-sidebar-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                            {% if fourth_promotional_image != blank %}               
                              {{ fourth_promotional_image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                                loading: loading_attribute,
                                sizes: "(min-width: 1024px) 100vw, 100vw",
                                widths: '375, 550, 750, 1100, 1500, 1780, 2000, 3000',
                                alt: fourth_promotional_image.alt | escape
                              }}
                            {% else %}
                              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                            {% endif %}  
                          </div>
                          {% if fourth_promotional_title != blank %}
                            <div class="header-sidebar-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ fourth_promotional_title }}</div>
                          {% endif %}
                        </{% if fourth_url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>        
                      {% endif %}         
                    </div>                  
                  </div>
                </div>
           
                {% if sidebar_menu_bottom_heading != blank %}
                  <div class="header-sidebar-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ sidebar_menu_bottom_heading }}</div>
                {% endif %}
        
                {% if bottom_sidebar_menu != blank %}
                  <div class="header-sidebar-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
                    <ul class="header-sidebar-bottom-list-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% for link in bottom_sidebar_menu.links %}
                        <li>
                          <a href="{{ link.url }}" class="header-bottom-menu-link-{{ section.id }}">{{ link.title }}</a>
                        </li>
                      {% endfor %}
                    </ul>
                  </div>   
                {% endif %}       
              </div>
            </div> 
          </div> 
        </div>

        <div class="header-logo-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if logo != blank %}
            <a href="{{ shop.url }}" class="header-logo-image-{{ section.id }} {% if logo_mobile != blank %}header-logo-desktop-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">
              <img src="{{ logo | image_url }}" alt="{{ logo.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %} {% if second_logo != blank %}class="header-logo-first-{{ section.id }}"{% endif %}>
              {% if second_logo != blank %}
                <img src="{{ second_logo | image_url }}" alt="{{ second_logo.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %} class="header-logo-second-{{ section.id }}">
              {% endif %}
            </a>
            {% if logo_mobile != blank %}
              <a href="{{ shop.url }}" class="header-logo-image-{{ section.id }} header-logo-mobile-{{ section.id }}">
                <img src="{{ logo_mobile | image_url }}" alt="{{ logo_mobile.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %} {% if second_logo_mobile != blank %}class="header-logo-first-{{ section.id }}"{% endif %}>
                {% if second_logo_mobile != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ second_logo_mobile | image_url }}" alt="{{ second_logo_mobile.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %} class="header-logo-second-{{ section.id }}">
                {% endif %}
              </a>
            {% endif %}
          {% else %}
            <a href="{{ shop.url }}" class="header-logo-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ shop.name }}</a>
          {% endif %}
        </div>

        <div class="header-right-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if use_search %}
            <a href="{{ routes.search_url }}" class="header-search-{{ section.id }} header-search-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="header-search-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="#121212" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="16" width="16">
                  <path d="m12.020666666666665 11.077866666666667 2.8551333333333333 2.8551333333333333 -0.9427999999999999 0.9427999999999999 -2.8551333333333333 -2.8551333333333333C10.051266666666667 12.842 8.749333333333333 13.333333333333332 7.333333333333333 13.333333333333332c-3.312 0 -6 -2.6879999999999997 -6 -6s2.6879999999999997 -6 6 -6 6 2.6879999999999997 6 6c0 1.416 -0.4913333333333333 2.7179333333333333 -1.3126666666666666 3.744533333333333Zm-1.3375333333333332 -0.49466666666666664C11.498333333333331 9.743066666666666 12 8.597066666666667 12 7.333333333333333c0 -2.578333333333333 -2.088333333333333 -4.666666666666666 -4.666666666666666 -4.666666666666666s-4.666666666666666 2.088333333333333 -4.666666666666666 4.666666666666666 2.088333333333333 4.666666666666666 4.666666666666666 4.666666666666666c1.2637333333333332 0 2.409733333333333 -0.5016666666666666 3.2498666666666662 -1.3168666666666666l0.09993333333333333 -0.09993333333333333Z" stroke-width="0.6667"></path>
                </svg>
              </span>
              <span class="header-search-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ search_text }}</span>
            </a>
          {% endif %}

          {%- if shop.customer_accounts_enabled and use_account -%}
            <a href="{%- if customer -%}{{ routes.account_url }}{%- else -%}{{ routes.account_login_url }}{%- endif -%}" class="header-account-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="header-account-icon-{{ section.id }}">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="#121212" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="16" width="16">
                  <path d="M7.999933333333333 11.333333333333332c2.4415999999999998 0 4.576666666666666 1.0500666666666665 5.738066666666667 2.6164666666666667l-1.228 0.5808666666666666C11.564866666666667 13.410466666666666 9.8982 12.666666666666666 7.999933333333333 12.666666666666666c-1.89828 0 -3.56492 0.7437999999999999 -4.510073333333333 1.8639999999999999l-1.2274933333333333 -0.5814666666666666C3.42384 12.383133333333333 5.5586400000000005 11.333333333333332 7.999933333333333 11.333333333333332Zm0 -10c1.8409333333333333 0 3.333333333333333 1.4923866666666665 3.333333333333333 3.333333333333333v2c0 1.7925333333333333 -1.4148666666666667 3.2545333333333333 -3.1887333333333334 3.3302666666666667L7.999933333333333 10c-1.8409533333333332 0 -3.333333333333333 -1.4924 -3.333333333333333 -3.333333333333333V4.666666666666666c0 -1.7925 1.4148666666666667 -3.2545466666666667 3.1887333333333334 -3.3302533333333333L7.999933333333333 1.3333333333333333Zm0 1.3333333333333333c-1.0651333333333333 0 -1.9357799999999998 0.8326133333333333 -1.9966066666666666 1.8824866666666664L5.999933333333333 4.666666666666666v2c0 1.1046 0.8954 2 2 2 1.0651333333333333 0 1.9358 -0.8325999999999999 1.9966 -1.8824666666666667L9.999933333333333 6.666666666666666V4.666666666666666c0 -1.1045666666666665 -0.8954666666666666 -2 -2 -2Z" stroke-width="0.6667"></path>
                </svg>
             </span>
              <span class="header-account-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ account_text }}</span>
            </a>
          {%- endif -%}

          <a href="{{ routes.cart_url }}" class="header-cart-{{ section.id }}">
            <span class="header-cart-icon-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="#121212" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="16" width="16">
                <path d="M2.66992 10.666666666666666V2.6666666666666665h-1.3333333333333333V1.3333333333333333h2c0.36819333333333326 0 0.6666666666666666 0.29847999999999997 0.6666666666666666 0.6666666666666666v8H12.295533333333333l1.3333333333333333 -5.333333333333333H5.336586666666666V3.333333333333333H14.482733333333332c0.36819999999999997 0 0.6666666666666666 0.29847999999999997 0.6666666666666666 0.6666666666666666 0 0.05450666666666666 -0.006666666666666666 0.10881333333333333 -0.01993333333333333 0.16169333333333333l-1.6666666666666665 6.666639999999999c-0.07413333333333333 0.29679999999999995 -0.3408 0.5049999999999999 -0.6467333333333333 0.5049999999999999H3.3365866666666664c-0.36818666666666666 0 -0.6666666666666666 -0.29846666666666666 -0.6666666666666666 -0.6666666666666666Zm1.3333333333333333 4.666666666666666c-0.73638 0 -1.3333333333333333 -0.5969333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 -1.3333333333333333s0.5969533333333332 -1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333 0.5969333333333333 1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333 -0.5969533333333332 1.3333333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333Zm8.000013333333332 0c-0.7363999999999999 0 -1.3333333333333333 -0.5969333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 -1.3333333333333333s0.5969333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333 0.5969333333333333 1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333 -0.5969333333333333 1.3333333333333333 -1.3333333333333333 1.3333333333333333Z" stroke-width="0.6667"></path>
              </svg>
            </span>     
            <span class="header-cart-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ cart_text }}</span>   
            <div class="cart-count-bubble">
              {%- if cart.item_count < 100 -%}
                <span aria-hidden="true">({{ cart.item_count }})</span>
              {%- endif -%}
            </div>    
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initHeader14() {
    const sliderContent = new Swiper(".header-sidebar-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      slidesPerView: 1.5,       
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.header-sidebar-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0)
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.header-sidebar-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0)     
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.header-sidebar-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0)
        }
      },
      mousewheel: {
        forceToAxis: true,
        releaseOnEdges: false,
        sensitivity: 1,
      },
      on: {
        init() {
          const container = document.querySelector('.header-sidebar-slider-{{ section.id }}');
    
          container.addEventListener('wheel', (event) => {
            const isTouchpad = Math.abs(event.deltaX) > 0 || Math.abs(event.deltaY) < 30;

            if (isTouchpad && Math.abs(event.deltaX) > Math.abs(event.deltaY)) {
              return;
            }
          }, { passive: true });

        }
      }
    }); 

    let header = document.querySelector('.header-{{ section.id }}');
    let menuMobile = document.querySelector('.header-menu-sidebar-{{ section.id }}');
    let mobileSubMenu = document.querySelectorAll('.header-menu-mobile-submenu-{{ section.id }}');
    let parentItems = document.querySelectorAll('.header-menu-item-parent-{{ section.id }}');

    if (header) {
      {% if show_type != 'top' %}
        if (window.scrollY > 0) {
            header.classList.add('onscroll');
        } else {
          header.classList.add('top');
        }
    
        let lastScrollTop = window.scrollY;
    
        document.addEventListener('scroll', () => {            
            const currentScrollTop = window.scrollY;
            const maxScroll = document.documentElement.scrollHeight - window.innerHeight;

            if (currentScrollTop === 0) {
              header.classList.add('top');
            }
    
            if (currentScrollTop <= 0) {
                header.classList.add('active');
                header.classList.remove('onscroll');
                return;
            }
    
            if (currentScrollTop >= maxScroll) {
                header.classList.remove('active');
                return;
            }
    
            if (currentScrollTop !== lastScrollTop) {
                if (header.classList.contains('scroll')) {
                    if (currentScrollTop > lastScrollTop) {
                        header.classList.remove('active');
                    } else {
                        header.classList.add('active');
                    }
                }
    
               if (header.classList.contains('transparent')) {
                  if (currentScrollTop === 0 && lastScrollTop > currentScrollTop) {
                      header.classList.remove('onscroll');
                      header.classList.add('top');
                  } else if (currentScrollTop > 0 && !header.classList.contains('onscroll')) {
                      setTimeout(() => {
                          header.classList.add('onscroll');
                          header.classList.remove('top');
                      }, 50);
                  }
              }

    
                lastScrollTop = currentScrollTop;
            }
        });
      {% endif %}

      
        let burger_icon = header.querySelector('.header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}');
        let sidebar = document.querySelector('.header-menu-sidebar-inner-{{ section.id }}');

        let burger_icons = header.querySelectorAll('.header-menu-burger-{{ section.id }}');
          if(burger_icons) {
            burger_icons.forEach(burger_icon => {
              burger_icon.addEventListener('click', () => {
                const isOpen = header.classList.contains('open');

                if (!isOpen) {
                  header.classList.add('open');
                  header.classList.add('onscroll');
                  document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
                  menuMobile.style.backgroundColor = '#0000005c'
                } else {
                  sidebar.style.transform = 'translateX(-130%)';
                  menuMobile.style.backgroundColor = '#00000000';
                  
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    header.classList.remove('open');
                    sidebar.style.transform = '';
                    document.body.style.overflow = '';
          
                    if (window.scrollY === 0 && header.classList.contains('transparent')) {
                      header.classList.remove('onscroll');
                      header.classList.add('top');
                    }
                  }, 500);
                }
              });
            });
          }


          document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target === menuMobile) {
              sidebar.style.transform = 'translateX(-130%)';

              setTimeout(() => {
                header.classList.remove('open');
                sidebar.style.transform = '';
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
              }, 1000)
            }
          });

          if (parentItems) {
            parentItems.forEach(el => {
                el.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
                    header.classList.add('onscroll'); 
                    el.classList.add('active');
                });

                el.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
                    el.classList.remove('active');
                    if (window.scrollY === 0) {
                        header.classList.remove('onscroll'); 
                    }
                });

                document.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                    if (!el.contains(event.target) && el.classList.contains('active')) {
                        el.classList.remove('active');
                    }
                });
            });
          }

          if (mobileSubMenu) {
            mobileSubMenu.forEach(el => {
                let parentItem = el.closest('.header-mobile-menu-item-parent-{{ section.id }}');
                let heading = el.querySelector('.header-menu-mobile-submenu-heading-{{ section.id }}');
                
                if (parentItem) {
                    parentItem.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        parentItem.classList.add('active');
                    });
                }

                if (heading) {
                    heading.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                        event.stopPropagation();
                        parentItem.classList.remove('active');
                    });
                }
            });
          }

      document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if(e.target == menuMobile) {
          document.body.style.overflow = '';
          header.classList.remove('open');       
        }
      });      
    }
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initHeader14);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initHeader14);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initHeader14);
  }
</script>

search_menu_mobile.label: Move search link to burger menu (mobile)
search_menu_mobile.description: Move search link to burger menu (mobile)

account_menu_mobile.label: Move account link to burger menu (mobile)
account_menu_mobile.description: Move account link to burger menu (mobile)

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
